thread.title: BREAKING: Two crashes involving four lorries and a pedestrian affect Lincolnshire motorway
thread.title_full: BREAKING: Two crashes involving four lorries and a pedestrian affect Lincolnshire motorway

title: BREAKING: Two crashes involving four lorries and a pedestrian affect Lincolnshire motorway
text:
BREAKING: Two crashes involving four lorries and a pedestrian affect Lincolnshire motorway BREAKING: Two crashes involving four lorries and a pedestrian affect Lincolnshire motorway A 'VERY serious incident' involving three lorries and another between a lorry and a pedestrian have happened in Lincolnshire during Friday morning rush hour. PUBLISHED: 08:42, Fri, Feb 3, 2017 | UPDATED: 08:59, Fri, Feb 3, 2017 Getty Two accidents are affecting motorways in Lincolnshire 
A pedestrian is believed to have died in the crash on the A158 between Lodge Lane Nettleham and North Lane Sudbrooke. 
The A-road has been closed and traffic is slow in both directions between the A15 Wragby Road East junction and the North Lane junction. 
Further south three lorries have crashed near Grantham on the A1, with police calling it a "very serious incident". 
The A1 is closed and slow traffic is moving in both directions between Grantham North and Harlaxton. 
Congestion is reaching back to Great Gonerby Turn Off and to Grantham South. 
This is breaking news. 
Please refresh or return for updates... Most read in UK
